name: DooD
description:
Be the space marine, but now from a bird's eye view! A short lil' game about The DooD Guy, a man whose... shooting demons I guess?

This is, technically, my first ever published game! I've been waiting for this! The development of this game was... weird, to say the least. I started it a WHILE ago before I even knew anything about LUA, then, after putting it off for like a year, I picked it up again and almost finished it! ...almost, then I put it BACK down. And now, after like, what, TWO MORE years? I picked it BACK UP and here we go! Have fun!

I will say, there is a single hard to reach easteregg, but it's not too hard to reach. See if you can find it anyways!

And yes, I know something is misspelled. I'm gonna fix it.
